About

This website shows hashtags trending today on TikTok, ordered by how likely it is for them to go viral. We currently cover the United States, the United Kingdom, and Pakistan.

Go to the country's page to get the full list. There, you'll also get charts showing the hashtag's popularity over the last month.

These hashtags can be used for various purposes, such as:

  • Discovering topics to talk about in your videos that will guarantee views.
  • Finding the best hashtags to add to your videos so that they go viral.
  • Performing social trend analysis.

FAQs

Why should I use hashtags that are trending today?

TikTok's algorithm operates by delivering content to users in accordance with their preferences. The use of hashtags plays a significant role in the platform's recommendation engine, aiding in the categorization of content based on users' past preferences. When you incorporate a specific hashtag in your TikTok video, you are effectively informing TikTok that your content falls within that particular category. If this category aligns with the interests of a broad audience, TikTok is more likely to suggest your video to a larger audience, resulting in increased views for your content.

Should I always have trending hashtags in my videos?

While it may seem beneficial to always use trending hashtags, it's not a strict rule. When you use a specific hashtag, your video gets shown to users who have engaged with content under that hashtag before. However, if the hashtag isn't genuinely related to your video, the viewers it attracts may not be your target audience. Without receiving enough engagement from your ideal audience, your video won't gain visibility among a broader audience. Therefore, it's crucial to use hashtags that truly align with the content of your video to ensure it reaches the right viewers.

How many hashtags should I add to my video?

Select a range of 3 to 6 hashtags for your video. Adding more than that may lead to confusion for the TikTok algorithm. Aim for a combination of both niche and popular hashtags to optimize your video's discoverability.
